Text saved: Because of these findings, we suggest that Girox Foods should use a management style that focuses more on people. To do this, we should find ways to offer our employees working hours that suit them better. We should also think about how we can let them work from places they choose. Managers need to consider different ways to challenge our employees. They should also give them more positive feedback and show they value the work they do. Spending more money on training, especially for social skills and talking with people from other countries, could also help. This would create a good environment for employees to do their best work.
